title: Personalize Email Marketing for New Content
description: An agent needs to create a personalized email campaign to promote a new sci-fi movie, targeting users who have previously watched similar content.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all subscribers who have watched at least three sci-fi movies in the past year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a target audience list of 50,000 subscribers.

tasks.description: Draft an email template for the campaign, including dynamic fields for the subscriber's name.
Schedule the email campaign to be sent to the target audience list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the email blast.
